body: You may use touch of fatigue as a spell-like ability. Creatures that are immune to pain effects are immune to this touch. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
name: Torturer's Touch
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Inquisitor/Inquisitions/Torture Inquisition/Granted Powers/Torturers Touch
